Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My proposal is to offer this remarkable product to you for $9500. This price reflects the high quality and utility of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
